Class CalculatorToolbox

Namespace
Vts.Modeling
Assembly
Vts.dll

Toolbox containing general method for the forward models. Most of these are for diffusion based calculations.

GetCubicFresnelReflectionMomentOfOrder1(double)

Fresnel first reflection moment, via S. Prahl thesis 1988 Polynomial expression, stated accurate for R1 and R2 better than 0.005. These polynomials should probably be replaced by the integral expression! TO be DONE
